original_text: All King Solomon's drinking vessels were of gold, and all the vessels of the House of the Forest of Lebanon were of pure gold. Silver was not considered as anything in the days of Solomon.
korean_text: 솔로몬 왕이 마시는 그릇은 다 금이요 레바논 나무 궁의 그릇들도 다 순금이라 솔로몬의 시대에 은을 귀하게 여기지 아니함은

sentences.original_text: All King Solomon's drinking vessels were of gold
sentences.korean_translation: 솔로몬 왕의 모든 음주 그릇은 금이었다

sentences.original_text: and all the vessels of the House of the Forest of Lebanon were of pure gold
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 레바논 숲의 궁에 있는 모든 그릇은 순금이었다

sentences.original_text: Silver was not considered as anything in the days of Solomon
sentences.korean_translation: 솔로몬의 시대에는 은이 아무것도 여겨지지 않았다
